original_text: Listen! Wisdom is calling out. She wants you to understand what is right, so she speaks in a loud voice.
korean_text: 지혜가 부르지 아니하느냐 명철이 소리를 높이지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: She wants you to understand what is right,
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 네가 무엇이 옳은지 이해하기를 원한다,

sentences.original_text: so she speaks in a loud voice.
